name: On Our Own
description: Following the collapse of Mittelafrika, many nations gained their independence. We have taken cover under the wing of our previous overlord, the French.\nTogether with them we shall rebuild our nation!

name: Expand the Topke System.
description: Most of our population lives in the countryside, and so we have patrols to inn the taxes: the Topke system. Expanding these patrols will allow us to increase our tax income.

name: Expand Hold over Plantations
description: Bring more plantations under our control, increasing the profits we get from them.

name: French Industrial Help
description: Invite the French to help up upgrade our factories with newer material and engineers.

name: Expand the Toll Systems
description: Part of our income came from tolls.\nUsing leftover German roads we can tax our population to renovate the other barren roads.

name: Exploit Natural Resources
description: Nature holds many treasures, and expanding our mines will help us exploit those.

name: Utilize French Expertise
description: Our Overlord, with its European roots, has more knowledge in the fields of science, production and warfare.\nUtilising some of that we can help advance our own country.

name: Further Resource Exploitation
description: For more wealth, we don't have to look far, like our underground mines.\nWe can expand our plantations to even greater size to fuel our budding economy.

name: Dahomey Stands On Its Own
description: With our country built up more than it has been in years, we can stand our own against foreigners trying to violate our sovereignty.

name: Ask Our Overlord For Assistance
description: We are a small nation. Asking our overlord for help, in military or industrial sense, might further both our positions in the world.

name: Tax Incentives
description: If we give a tax deduction to companies heralding from our overlord, we will grow our economy!

name: Our Navy
description: Many years ago our French overlord built ports for us, but these have fallen into ruins under the Germans.\nWe shall rebuild them so we can have our own navy once more.

name: The Royal Flagships
description: We shall focus our efforts on a grand Flagship to make our presence known on the waves; quality is better than quality ideas after all

name: Support Fleet
description: Our naval capacity isn't great, and building a support fleet will allow us to have a fleet this decade at least.

name: Rule the Waves
description: Our naval officers haven't been on the waves too long; more naval training will help get them up to speed with modern naval doctrine.

name: The State Of Our Army
description: We haven't had an army in years and rebuilding will take a while.\nWe shall start with reinstating the draft and creating divisions once more.

name: Initiate Army Reform
description: The army has not been in battle for a long time.\nWe shall hold war games and other practices to get out doctrine to a more modern state.

name: King-General of Dahomey
description: Historically our Leaders stood alongside our generals; the attention of our ruler shall make out men more attentive and thus effective.

name: Import Foreign Arms
description: We have a history of importing foreign arms.\nShopping around for foreign arms will supplement our small arms production.

name: Reinstate Agaja's Dowry
description: We shall reinstate the dowry, a monetary bonus for our soldiers that King Agaja created many years ago.\nEven though it will cost us money, our men will be more willing to fight.

name: Dahomey's Amazons
description: Disbanded when we became a French protectorate, we shall recreate our glorious Ahosi.\nThe elite group of female warriors, integrated into the core of our army, were incredibly courageous and this new regiment will inspire our men to fight harder!

name: German Salvage
description: We can salvage German leftovers from their hasty retreat into Nigeria to make for some short term cash gain

name: Strip Their Banners!
description: German times are behind us and so we shall clear the whole country of their foul imagery and any enclaves who are still loyal to the foul Huns.

name: Empty Their Barracks!
description: Scrapping and salvaging the small German garrison' barracks that still remain will give us a good small stockpile of small arms.

name: Expel their loyalists!
description: Most of the Auth. Dems. are supporters of the old regime, expelling them will lower their influence in the country. This will cement our legality to rule and less political opponents can never hurt right?

name: Woo the French
description: Dahomey has long been a French subject, from before the Germans came along.\nNot everyone shares the love towards the French, and we might need to go a different direction than before.

name: Deepen Protectorate Ties
description: The world is a big place, with powers far greater than us trying to toy with our land. Seeking closer ties with our overlord might save guard our nation more effectively that we could alone.

name: Status Quo
description: The world is a dangerous place, many things happen above our head, and keeping it down, might save it from getting chopped.

name: Balanced Posture
description: While the French aren't exactly evil overlords, if things just happen to make us more independent, what stops us from capitalising on it.

name: University of Porto Novo
description: We shall establish the University of Porto Novo to spread new scientific thought and accelerate our research.
